resources.string: කරුණාකර ඔබගේ අන්තර්ජාල සම්බන්ධතාවය පරීක්ෂා කර නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න.
මෙම වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය දැනටමත් ලියාපදිංචි කර ඇත
PLEASE VERIFY YOUR DETAILS AND TRY AGAIN
ඔබ ලබාදුන් දු.ක. අංකය දැනටමත් ලියාපදිංචි කර ඇත. යළි උත්සාහ කරන්න
This account already has a password and email associated. Please log in by email.
කෙටි පණිඩිඩයක් හරහා කේතයක් යවා ඇත. නව එකක් ගැනීමට විනාඩි 10 කට පසු නැවත යැවීම මත තට්ටු කරන්න.
You can send messages up to %1$s characters long.
To take and send photos, grant permission to access the camera
ඉදිරියට යෑමෙන් ඔබ _භාවිත නියම_ වලට එකඟ වේ.
We sent an email to \n[[%1$s]]. \nFollow the link to verify your address.
The email address you entered is not valid. Please verify and try again
කෙටි පණිවිඩයක් හරහා නව කේතයක් යැවිණි
Do you want to receive news and product updates from Wire via email? You can unsubscribe at any time.
I agree that Wire may create and use anonymous usage and error reports to improve the Wire App. I can revoke this consent at any time.
The service is unavailable at the moment
I\'m on Wire, search for %1$s or visit get.wire.com
[[%1$s]] සැමට කියවූ බටව ලදුපත් සක්‍රිය කළා
[[%1$s]] සැමට කියවූ බටව ලදුපත් අක්‍රිය කළා
[[You]] සැමට කියවූ බටව ලදුපත් සක්‍රිය කළා
[[You]] සැමට කියවූ බටව ලදුපත් අක්‍රිය කළා

resources.string: නෛතික රැඳවුම ක්‍රියාත්මක වූ හෙයින් [[You]] මෙම සංවාදයෙන් ඉවත් කෙරිණි. _තව දැනගන්න_
නෛතික රැඳවුම ක්‍රියාත්මක වූ හෙයින් යමෙක් මෙම සංවාදයෙන් ඉවත් කෙරිණි. _තව දැනගන්න_
නෛතික රැඳවුම ක්‍රියාත්මක වූ හෙයින් %1$s මෙම සංවාදයෙන් ඉවත් කෙරිණි. _තව දැනගන්න_
නෛතික රැඳවුම ක්‍රියාත්මක වූ හෙයින් %1$s මෙම සංවාදයෙන් ඉවත් කෙරිණි. _තව දැනගන්න_
A message from [[%1$s]] could not be decrypted.\n _FIX TO DECRYPT FUTURE MESSAGES_
You can now decrypt future messages from [[%1$s]]. To recover lost messages, [[ask %2$s to resend them.]]\n(FIXED ERROR: [[%3$s]] ID: %4$s)
A MESSAGE FROM YOU WAS NOT RECEIVED. _WHY?_
[[%1$s]]\'S DEVICE IDENTITY CHANGED. UNDELIVERED MESSAGE. _LEARN MORE_
YOUR DEVICE IDENTITY CHANGED. UNDELIVERED MESSAGE. _LEARN MORE_
[[%1$s was unable to decrypt some of your messages but has solved the issue.]] This affected all conversations you share together.
%1$s and you started using a _new device_
%1$s and %2$s others started using a _new device_
%1$s, %2$s others and you started using a _new device_
YOU HAVEN\'T USED THIS DEVICE FOR A WHILE. SOME MESSAGES MAY NOT APPEAR HERE.
මෙම සංවාදය නෛතික රැඳවුම යටතේ තිබේ _තව දැනගන්න_
මෙම සංවාදය සඳහා නෛතික රැඳවුම අක්‍රිය කෙරිණි
No app found to open this file type
Sharing files with the .%1$s extension is not permitted by your organization
THE LOCATION WILL APPEAR ON THE MAP WHEN YOU ARE BACK ONLINE.
To call, hang up your current call.
Go to Settings and allow Wire to access the microphone.
Wire doesn\'t have access to the camera
You might experience issues during the call
VIDEO STOPPED DUE TO POOR CONNECTION
You received a call that isn\'t supported by this version of Wire.\n\nGet the latest version in the Play Store.
A call is active in another conversation.\nCalling here will hang up the other call.
A call is active in another conversation.\nJoining this call will hang up the other one.
You can\'t record an audio message while on a call
You can\'t record a video message while on a call
Double tap on a tile for fullscreen
Double tap to go back, pinch to zoom
The call was disconnected because someone is no longer a verified contact.
Someone started using a new device.

plurals.name: conversation__degraded_confirmation__message
plurals.item: ඔබට තවමත් ඔබගේ පණිවිඩය යැවීමට අවශ්‍යද?
ඔබට තවමත් ඔබගේ පණිවිඩ යැවීමට අවශ්‍යද?

resources.string: මෙම සංවාදය දැන් නෛතික රැඳවුමට භාජනය වේ.
You won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to contact you or add you to group conversations.
මෙය ඔබගේ සියලු උපාංගවල සංවාද ඉතිහාසය හිස් කරනු ඇත.
This will delete the group and all content for all participants on all devices. There is no option to restore the content. All participants will be notified.
We will send an email to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
We will send a SMS to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Name must have 2 or more characters
Send anonymous crash reports and basic data like version number and operating system to help Wire identify and solve issues in the app.

Usage data allows Wire to understand how the app is being used and how it can be improved. The data is anonymous and does not include the content of your communications (such as messages, files or calls).
Receive news and product updates from Wire via email.
Wire is locked due to inactivity
To unlock Wire, set up a passcode in your device settings.
Your organization needs to lock your app when Wire is not in use to keep the Team safe.\nCreate a memorable passcode, as it cannot be recovered.
There was a change in Wire

This makes audio calls use less data and work better on slower networks. Turn off to use constant bitrate encoding (CBR). This setting only affects 1:1 calls; conference calls always use CBR encoding.
Wire\'s contents will no longer be visible in the task switcher
Disable to send via the keyboard.
Lock Wire after %1$s seconds in the background. Unlock with Pin, Pattern, Passcode or Biometrics.
The keyboard will not show suggestions when typing messages
If you don\'t recognize a device above, remove it and reset your passcode.
Wire gives every device a unique fingerprint. Compare them and verify your devices and conversations.
If fingerprints don\'t match, reset the session to generate new encryption keys on both sides.
Remove this device if you have stopped using it. You will be logged out of this device immediately.
This stores troubleshooting information locally. Disabling this option will delete all local logs.
You can submit this to Wire Support to help diagnose problems.
If you experience problems with push notifications, Wire Support may ask you to reset this token.
Please describe the steps required to reproduce the issue, provide screenshots if possible and send this email.\n\n

Wire will try to keep a connection with the server open to receive notifications while the application is not in the foreground. Turning this setting off may improve battery performance, but you will no longer receive notifications when Wire is in the background. This applies to all accounts on this device.
This performs a full synchronization with the server.
Are you sure? The full synchronization may take a while.
Enter the verification code we sent to %s
ඔබගේ වි-තැපෑලෙහි ලැබෙන පෙට්ටිය පරීක්ෂා කර උපදෙස් අනුගමනය කරන්න.
We will send a notification code to:\n%s
Are you sure you want to remove %s from your Wire account?
අවම වශයෙන් අකුරු 2 ක්. a—z, 0—9 හා _ පමණි.
මෙය අක්‍රිය කර ඇති විට, ඔබට වෙනත් පුද්ගලයින්ගෙන් කියවූ බවට ලදුපත් දැකිය නොහැකියි. සමූහ සංවාද සඳහා මෙම සැකසුම අදාළ නොවේ.
Wire is so much nicer with a picture.
You must be online to leave the conversation. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to remove people from conversations. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to call. Check your connection and try again.
Notifications for all message types, including text, images, audio and video messages.
Notifications when other users ping you
Notifications about ongoing processes or secondary actions, such as calls or saving an image
This notification is necessary to keep the connection to the server alive while Wire is in the background and Google Play Services are not installed.
Please install the latest version of Wire.
වයර් විවෘත කර බෙදා ගැනීමට පිවිසෙන්න.
You can not share this file because this feature is disabled.
%1$s does not want to be added to conversations.
One of the people you selected does not want to be added to conversations.
Something went wrong, please try again.

resources.string: Enter the verification code we sent to \n%s
TAP COLOR TO CHANGE THE BRUSH SIZE.\n\nSHAKE TO REMOVE PHOTOS.
TAP COLOR TO CHANGE THE BRUSH SIZE.\n\nPRESS AND HOLD TO FILL AN AREA.
Drag the map to change location
Unable to retrieve current location, permissions denied
Enable location in settings to show your current position
Google Play Services is needed for location sharing
Do you want to allow Wire to access your location?
Remove one of your other devices to start using Wire on this one.
Wire gives every device a unique fingerprint. Compare them with %1$s and verify your conversation.
%1$s is using an old version of Wire. No devices are shown here.
Verify that this matches the fingerprint shown on %1$s\'s device.
ඔබ මෙම උපාංගයේ වයර් භාවිතා කරන පළමු අවස්ථාව මෙයයි.
පෞද්ගලිකත්ව හේතූන් මත, ඔබගේ සංවාද ඉතිහාසය මෙහි නොපෙන්වනු ඇත.
The picture will appear when you are on Wi-Fi again
Unable to retrieve the specified file
Uploading large files is not supported.
You can send files up to %1$s.
Are you sure you want to send a large file via the mobile network?
Are you sure you want to send %1$s via the mobile network?
To send audio messages, grant permission to record audio.
Tap and hold to send an audio message
Tap to record a message\nyou can _GLYPH_ it after that
Audio messages are limited to 25MB. Send this message?
මෙම පණිවිඩය යවන විට කියවූ බවට ලදුපත් සක්‍රීයව තිබුනේ නැත.
මෙම පණිවිඩය කිසිවෙකු තවමත් කියවා නැත.
මෙම පණිවිඩයට කිසිවෙකු තවමත් මනාපය දක්වා නැත.
SET A TIME FOR THE MESSAGE TO DISAPPEAR
Claim your unique name on Wire. _Learn more._
You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
You will appear as Busy to other people. You will only receive notifications for mentions, replies, and calls in conversations that are not muted.
You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
Status affects notifications now. You\'re set to \"Away\" and won\'t receive any notifications.
Status affects notifications now. You\'re set to \"Busy\" and will only receive notifications when someone mentions you or replies to one of your messages.
You have connected a device to your Wire account
If you didn\'t do this, remove the device and reset your password.
සැමවිටම ඔබට එය පසුව වෙනස් කළ හැකිය.
Enter the verification code we sent to %1$s.
පවුලේ අය හා යහළුවන් සමඟ පෞද්ගලික කතාබහට
ව්‍යාපාර, ආයතන හා වෘත්තීමය සංවිධාන සඳහා ආරක්‍ෂිත සහයෝගිත්‍වයට
Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
සමාගමේ තනි-පිවිසුම් (SSO) ප්‍රවේශ කේතය ඇතුල් කරන්න.
THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF INVITATIONS HAS BEEN SENT
SOMETHING WENT WRONG, PLEASE TRY AGAIN
Your Wire team is ready to go. Invite your colleagues as members.
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow. To enable them, ask your administrator.
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow.
අමුත්තන් සහ සේවාවන් ට ඉඩ දෙන්න
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
ඔබ කියවූ බවට ලදුපත් අබල කර ඇත
දෙපාර්ශ්වයම කියවූ බවට ලදුපත් සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ නම් පණිවිඩ කියවන විට ඔබට දැකගත හැකිය.
ඔබගේ ගිණුමේ සැකසුම් තුළ මෙම විකල්පය වෙනස් කළ හැකිය.
When this is on, the admin can add or remove people and services, update group settings, and change a participant’s role.
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
අමුත්තන් සහ සේවාවන් ට ඉඩ දෙන්න
Self-deleting messages will be turned on for all the participants in this conversation
You can be notified about everything (including audio and video calls) or only when you are mentioned.
Could not allow guests nor services. Please try again.
වත්මන් අමුත්තන් සහ සේවා සංවාදයෙන් ඉවත් කෙරේ. නව අමුත්තන් සහ සේවා සඳහා ඉඩ නොදෙනු ඇත.
Anyone with the link can join the conversation, even if they don\'t have Wire
නව අමුත්තන්ට මෙම සබැඳිය සමඟ එක්වීමට නොහැකි වනු ඇත. වත්මන් අමුත්තන්ට තවමත් ප්‍රවේශය ඇත.
මෙම සංවාදයට ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායමෙන් පිටත පුද්ගලයින්ට එක් වීමට හැකිය
Create a backup to preserve your conversation history. You can use this to restore history if you lose your device or switch to a new one. \n\nChoose a strong password to protect the backup file.
The backup will be compressed and encrypted with a password. Make sure to store it in a secure place.
You need an email address and a password to use Wire on multiple devices.
ඔබගේ වයර් ගිණුම සඳහා මුරපදය ඇතුල් කරන්න.\n%1$s
ඔබ මෙම උපාංගයේ මීට පෙර වයර් භාවිතා කර ඇත.
If that was long ago, some messages may not appear here.
The backup contents will replace the conversation history on this device. You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform.
You need an email and a password in order to back up your conversation history. You can do it from the account page in Settings.
You may not have enough space or permission to save it there.
ඔබගේ ඉතිහාසය ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණය කළ නොහැකි විය.
This backup was created by a newer or outdated version of Wire and cannot be restored here.
ඔබට වෙනත් ගිණුමකින් ඉතිහාසය ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණය කළ නොහැකිය.

Up to %1$s people can join a conversation.

ව්‍යවසාය පිවිසුම සඳහා මෙම වි-තැපෑල භාවිතා කළ නොහැකිය. ඉදිරියට යාමට කරුණාකර තනි-පිවිසුම් (SSO) කේතය ඇතුල් කරන්න.
Please enter a valid email or SSO access code.
Please enter a valid SSO access code.
This email is linked to a different server, but the app can only be connected to one server at a time. Please log out of all Wire accounts on this device and try to log in again.
Please verify your company SSO access code and try again.
You can only be logged in with two accounts at once. Log out from one to add another.

අංකයක්, ලොකු අකුරක්, කුඩා අකුරක් සහ විශේෂ සංකේතයක් අඩංගු වන අවම වශයෙන් අකුරු %1$s ක් සහිත මුරපදයක් ඔබගේ උපාංගයට තිබිය යුතුය.
